review.comment: Everyone is so friendly there and they take their lockdown and social distancing protocols seriously. Even though it’s a bit of a journey for me coming from Toronto, I always look forward to my appointments. Hope they open a branch here soon

review.comment: Whenever we have gone to Freedom Medi Spa for any services, the staff are always very courteous to begin with and their knowledge of laser hair removal, as well as any other facial/body procedures is clearly apparent. With years of experience in the field of medi-spa treatments, I always feel in expert hands when I have any treatments done.

thanks Freedom Medi-Spa

review.comment: I had my first laser experience with Monica this week and absolutely loved it. She made me feel very comfortable and was so knowledgeable. I’m so happy I chose Freedom Medispa!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are happy you chose us too! See you soon!

review.comment: Had a great experience, staff is pleasant and qualified, highly recommend it!

review.comment:
I have been going to Freedom Med- Spa for over a year now for laser hair removal and honestly the only regret I have is not going sooner. The staff is super friendly and welcoming. Daniella was extremely detailed when I had my phone consult and answered every single question and made sure I completely understood everything. Ashley is amazing and makes the whole process so easy. She makes me feel comfortable and relaxed. Honestly the best decision I have ever made was coming here for treatment. Thank you guys!!
Jessica .B.
review.review_reply: Thanks for the stellar review, Littleheros.

review.comment: Had a peel done and love the experience at Freedom Medi-Spa. I usually have my appointments with Monica and she’s such a great asset to the team. Makes my overall experience amazing. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Raquel! So glad you enjoyed your peel! Yes Monica is amazing! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

review.comment: I have used almost all of the services over the the last eight years. The quality of each treatment is excellent and it is performed with such excellence and grace. Freedom Medi Spa is a 'visit', it's like going to see a dear friend who makes each of your experiences unique!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for your review. Hope to see you again!

review.comment: My experience at this spa was awesome, Daniella is wonderful! I am a black woman and  this is my first experience with laser hair removal. Daniella explained everything along the way and always checked in  on how I was feeling. I am so happy that I bit the bullet to do this! I have one less thing to maintain! Woot woot!

review.comment:
I thoroughly enjoyed my treatment by Ashley at Freedom Medi Spa. I have never seen the results so quickly from other treatments! The treatment was a facial peel using Lumeire product line. My skin looks so clear, fresh and has an illumination that I have never seen before.
The service, care and attention to detail was exceptional. Freedom Medi Spa is always a calm oasis that provides good quality products; knowledgeable clinicians and is spotlessly clean.
All COVID 19 protocols are followed and you are always made to feel you are important. I can’t wait til I get to return again before the holiday season!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Jane! What a wonderful review. We truly appreciate it and we appreciate you!

Will definitely be visiting again !!!!

review.comment: Just had my first laser treatment for full legs - such a great experience. It’s not easy finding a place that has a really good quality machine but I am thankful I was recommended Freedom Medi Spa. Daniela is so kind and was very helpful in answering all of my questions during the consultation. Ashley did my treatment - she made me feel super comfortable talking me through what she was doing and constantly making sure I was ok. Looking forward to finishing my treatments here!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Cassandra for the wonderful review! We are thrilled you had a great experience.

review.comment: Daniela and her team are beyond wonderful. Daniela is so genuine and well educated, I trust her and her team 100%. I am confident that what they recommend for me is truly with the intent to help me with whatever issues I may have, They never “sell” me on any product or service. I highly recommend Freedom Medi Spa to everyone!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the beautiful review! We love that you are happy with our services and recommendations. Looking forward to seeing you back in the clinic as soon as we are able to reopen!
Thank you so much!

review.comment: As always Freedom Medi-spa did not disappoint right from the moment I booked my appointment to the end of the treatment. From my Booking, to the reminders, to my arrival and of course the treatment. If I had to rate the spa out of 10, I choose the Spinal tap route and give them an 11. Thank you again for making me the client truly number 1.
